name: LONELINESS AFTER: Chapter 1
description: LONELINESS AFTER a game where nothing is clear, but only some moments bring little clarity to what is happening...You have to be very careful and careful to do it the way it should be. Unclear memories, strange actions, relaxing and frightening atmosphere...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows: 7 Processor: 2.0 GHz - low budget models like Celeron Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 550TI DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows: 10 Processor: 3.0 GHz - models like i5-4460 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 750TI DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
